extension.summary: Plays a slide show of the currently playing artist.
extension.description: Whilst playing music, this addon will start a slideshow of images related to the current artist. The slideshow can be configured to automatically start when Kodi starts playing music. Images are retrieved from a number of configurable sources. Tip: Pressing "i" during a slideshow will show the music player info.
